page.title: 03Housing
page.content: 1. In our block approximately 45% is public sector (local authority and Scottish Special Housing Association.) 55% is owner-occupied or privately rented. 2.A variety of different types of housing both old and new.Detached, Semi_detached,terraced blocks of flats. 3.My name is Louise Carruthers.I live at 190 Alloway Dr,Harestanes.Our house is over 15 years old.It has 2 large gardens,2 bedrooms,a living room,1 bathroom,a kitchen,a dining room and a large hall. My name is David Fulton.I live at 143 Alloway Dr,Harestanes.My house is about 17 years old.My house has 3 bedrooms,a living room,a kitchen,a dining room.
